name: Baked Potatoes
recipeIngredient: Salt and freshly ground pepper to taste
Scallion and Yogurt-Cheese Stuffing, optional (see recipe) OR
Smoked Salmon and Scallion Stuffing, optional (see recipe) OR
Hearty Portobello Stuffing, optional (see recipe) OR
Curried-Spinach Stuffing with Caramelized Onions, optional (see recipe)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 450 degrees. Prick the potatoes several times with a fork and coat lightly with olive oil. Place directly in the oven and bake until tender, about 1 hour. Split the potatoes lengthwise, fluff with a fork and season with salt and pepper.
Spoon the stuffing into the potatoes and serve immediately.
